mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission_role AS rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = #{uid}
